attributes.action: More safe and secure free parking for HGV's
attributes.additional_details: A driver was killed recently when he was parked overnight in a a layby on the A38, every week thousands of pounds of diesel is stolen from lorries parked in laybys
attributes.background: Lorry drivers in the UK are forced to pay extortionate amounts for parking in services to recieve dirty and sometimes cold washing facilties and poor unhealthy food choices or risk their loads, diesel and safety in laybys and industrial estates, make more parking free and secure
